lead_paragraph: Will MacKenzie shot an eight-under-par 64 to take a one-shot lead over Lucas Glover, Steve Marino, Brian Davis and Jeff Overton after the first round of the Wyndham Championship in Greensboro, N.C. MacKenzie nearly made a hole in one and had nine birdies to offset a bogey.
